name: Dillo Guy
storyline:
A private military company creates a super soldier by fusing the DNA of an armadillo with a recruit.
They use religion as a means to control the actions of the “Dillo Guy”.
Dillo Guy is tasked with collecting 50 gems inside a series of rooms, or else the “world will end”.
The rooms are, however, a simulation, and are a facility for experimental creations to be trained and provide combat data.
Dillo Guy represents the latest creation after a long string of failures.
A war-torn country has developed an advanced military combat vehicle, which DILLO GUY has been created to destroy.
summary: Dillo Guy is a Single-screen, 2D platforming game where the player needs to collect 50 gems inside 50 rooms, or else the World will end.
